text: Pukhraj Bafna is an Indian pediatrician and adolescent health consultant, known for his contributions towards tribal child and adolescent health. The Government of India honored Bafna in 2011, with the fourth highest civilian award of Padma Shri. == References == Category:People from Chhattisgarh Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Indian physicians
title: Pukhraj Bafna
